project_plan.name: Simple Contact Book in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a simple contact book application that allows users to add, search, update, and delete contacts. The contacts will be stored in a JSON file, and the user will interact with the application via the terminal.

task.name: Implement the feature to add a contact
Implement the feature to search for a contact
Implement the feature to update a contact
Implement the feature to delete a contact
Write tests for each of the features above
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
